trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que permite-lhe para alojar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlar num [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] página.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, posições elementos subordinados e determina um tamanho para um <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref>-classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: A área final no principal que este elemento deve utilizar para dispor próprio e os respectivos valores secundários.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o fundo do controlo alojada como uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>campo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, esta propriedade está mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades do controlo alojado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the Background property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o mapeamento de propriedade em segundo plano, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedades do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Brush* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *Pincel* consulte para a sintaxe de atributo de XAML.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> set to the background color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> definido para a cor de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*> to build the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a implementação de classe base do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>para criar o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: The parent window's handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: Identificador da janela principal (HWND).

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o controlo subordinado alojado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Only one child control can be hosted, but Child can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: Controlo subordinado de um só pode ser alojado, mas subordinado pode ter qualquer número de elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado não pode ser um formulário de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: If Child is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se for subordinado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage `<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` ## XAML Values *object* A element (or a possible subclass).
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML `<` *objeto* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>` `` # # XAML valores *objeto* A elemento (ou uma subclasse de possíveis).

trans-unit.source: *hostedControl* An element that specifies the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: *hostedControl* um elemento que especifica o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Especificar o controlo personalizado no markup normalmente, requer um mapeamento de xmlns, consulte [espaços de nomes XAML e mapeamento de espaço de nomes para WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: O alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa de atribuir um formulário de nível superior como o controlo alojado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>para eliminar a janela de que o contém.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore*>

trans-unit.source: A window handle.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de janela.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref>, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref>e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método de Dispose disposes base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Permite que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> para funcionar corretamente quando for aberta modelessly de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableWindowsFormsInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método EnableWindowsFormsInterop para reencaminhar todas as mensagens de teclado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>é aberto modelessly.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The EnableWindowsFormsInterop method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O método EnableWindowsFormsInterop instala um filtro de mensagem que é necessário para formulários modeless funcionar corretamente quando aberto por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: Tem de chamar este método apenas uma vez para um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a família de tipo de letra do controlo alojada.

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta definição de propriedade afeta apenas esses controlos cujo modelo utiliza a propriedade como parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: Não tem efeito em outros controlos.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>campo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty>

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, esta propriedade está mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controlo alojado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e o mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* representação de um valor igual ou maior que 0.0, mas inferior . de cadeia

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Isto é interpretado como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] medida.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: As cadeias não precisam de incluir explicitamente decimais.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de 1 é aceitável.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a layout error, such as a skew or rotation that <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> does not support, is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um erro de esquema, tal como um desfasamento ou rotação que <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> não suporta, foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*> to measure the size of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a implementação de classe base do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>para medir o tamanho de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> de objeto e devolver tamanhos adequados para o motor de esquema.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride*>

trans-unit.source: Size constraints in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho restrições em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] esquema são as restrições de disco rígidas.

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: Se as restrições for excedidas, o anfitrião tem recortar o conteúdo na região alojada.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: A implementação deste método impõe este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The available size for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho disponível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho pretendido o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element.

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.
trans-unit.target: Força a conversão de uma propriedade mapeada.

trans-unit.source: Calling the OnPropertyChanged method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: Poderá ser necessário chamar o método OnPropertyChanged quando uma propriedade de um elemento de predecessor tiver sido alterado, mas o valor do local de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>elemento não foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e o mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos que identificam a propriedade alterada, bem como fornecer valores de antigos e novos essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tamanho do preenchimento pretendido dentro de alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *Thickness* See for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *espessura* consulte para a sintaxe de atributo de XAML.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> structure representing the padding pf the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> estrutura que representa pf preenchimento o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> element affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o mapeamento de propriedade que determina como a definição de propriedades no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> elemento afeta o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologias tem dois modelos de propriedade de diferentes mas semelhantes.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Mapeamento de propriedade* suporta interoperacionalidade entre arquiteturas de dois.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e o mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"></xref> properties to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref> que mapeia <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost"> </xref> propriedades para as propriedades de alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: Scales the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlar e controla o fator de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls do not support scaling in the same way as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)]controlos não suportam de dimensionamento da mesma forma como [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementos.

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, dimensionamento um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlo a partir de um fator de 1 para um fator de 0,5 e voltar a um fator de 1 não, recuperar em geral, o tamanho original do controlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [considerações de esquema para o elemento de WindowsFormsHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Override the ScaleChild method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método ScaleChild para fornecer o comportamento de dimensionamento personalizado para o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
trans-unit.target: O factor de dimensionamento de novo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref> que representa o fator de dimensionamento aplicado para o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de separador do controlo alojada.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>campo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para alterar a ordem da navegação do separador entre os controlos num formulário.

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo com um índice de separador inferior irá receber o foco antes de um controlo com um índice superior.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: O índice de separador para navegação separador e foco.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Forwards focus from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Reencaminha o foco do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] para o alojada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] controlo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>elemento recebe um comando de SEPARADOR do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>método, o primeiro elegíveis controlar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A>recebe o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controlo é especificado pelo `request` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Quando `request` é <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, o comportamento é semelhante ao premir a tecla de tabulação.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: Quando `request` é <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>, o comportamento é semelhante à premindo SHIFT + separador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"></xref> that specifies the focus behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest"> </xref> que especifica o comportamento de foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a control was activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um controlo foi ativado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, acede o processo de janela da janela de elemento subordinado alojado.

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: Identificador da janela da janela alojada.

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
trans-unit.target: Mensagem agir.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Informações que podem ser relevantes para processar a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: Isto é normalmente utilizado para armazenar pequenos blocos de informação, tal como sinalizadores.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Informações que podem ser relevantes para processar a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
trans-unit.target: Isto é normalmente utilizado para fazer referência a um objeto.

trans-unit.source: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: Indica se os eventos resultante deverá ser marcados processado.

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela da janela subordinada.
